name: youtube_topviews_year
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool musicdata_api.
Tool description: Data for Youtube, Spotify music videos, tracks, albums, artist & more
API description: Top Youtube viewed videos all time / on a specific year (2007 - now). Leave {year} blank for all time results

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the top-viewed YouTube videos. Use an empty string to retrieve all-time top views.
